name: spimed
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl6(w0, w1, wex(s0, w2), wal(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))
-| wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

comment: Deduction version of ~ spime . (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Feb-2018.)
